data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Maha Sarakham.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maha Sarakham, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Maha Sarakham.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Maha Sarakham, Thailand.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Maha Sarakham words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Hui, Muslim Chinese people.
Spirit, cause the 6,057 believers in Maha Sarakham to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Maha Sarakham to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maha Sarakham, Thailand has a population of 936,800.

We estimate Maha Sarakham has 6,057 people who might know Jesus, 6,184 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 924,559 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Maha Sarakham, Thailand.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
